snippet: As the special inspector general for Afghan reconstruction, John F. Sopko says that “embarrassing people” is part of his job cataloging waste, mismanagement and fraud.
abstract: John F Sopko, special inspector general for Afghan reconstruction, has made practice of widely publicizing waste, mismanagement and fraud surrounding American reconstruction projects in Afghanistan; Sopko has been instrumental in shaping now-prevalent view among Americans that war in Afghanistan has become expensive boondoggle no longer worth fighting.
lead_paragraph: As the special inspector general for Afghan reconstruction, John F. Sopko says that “embarrassing people” is part of his job cataloging waste, mismanagement and fraud.

headline.main: To American Watchdog on Afghan Reconstruction, Bluntness Is a Weapon
headline.print_headline: To American Watchdog on Afghan Reconstruction, Bluntness Is a Weapon
